document_data.name: ''World of Coins: Musings on Merchantry''
document_data.author: [[Tarth Ammarander]]
document_data.Contents: The ''World of Coins'' was a collection of thoughts and meditations on the mercantile profession and the elaborate but necessary set of skills required to be successful in that vocation. The book discussed the skill of weaving falsehoods and its possible dangers and downfalls.
